com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib

Class AGroupThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.gmail.lepeska.martin.udplib.AGroupThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupClientThread, GroupServerThread

    public abstract class AGroupThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Common methods and components of GroupRunnables.
